Text: Thanks sudhir108 for this well known book in India.I just want to say (if I may) that this subject  is known as "Dynamics of Machines" or TOM III which is part of the final year Mech.Engg. syllabus in India.Thanks once again and waiting for more uploads from you.

Just had a brief glance at the first chapter and already noticed some hopelessly outdated definitions, like for meter and second. Use at your own risk.

Also, why every chapter in a separate PDF file?
